webpageTypes.data-aggregator: Data Aggregator (e.g., Yahoo Finance, Google Finance)
webpageTypes.sec-filings: Corporate Filings With The SEC (e.g., finding or reading 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, etc.)
webpageTypes.irrelevant: Irrelevant (e.g., checking mail, checking Facebook, etc.)

characterizeResearch.fundamental-analysis: Finding or Reading a Company’s Corporate Filings (10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, etc.) – Fundamental Analysis
characterizeResearch.technical-analysis: Technical Analysis (e.g., researching stock trends, historical price, ratios, etc.)
characterizeResearch.current-news: Reading Current Events/News about the Company of interest
characterizeResearch.company-background: Learning Company Background (e.g., history, management information, company practices, etc.)
characterizeResearch.gather-3rd-party-opinions: Gathering Other 3rd party Opinions (e.g., Investment Blog Predictions, etc.)
